p.k: Rescue Ranger / Ranger Games / Tubin' / Spa Day Tabes helps the Bears rescue Charlie after he gets captured by a villainous game hunter. / Grizz helps Ranger Tabes and the Poppy Rangers play a game of kickball against their rivals. / In search of some adventure, the Bears ride a tube down a dangerous river. / The Bears have a relaxing day at the spa. Grizz tries to get everything the spa has to offer. Panda gets trapped in the steam room with an old man. And Ice Bear plays ping pong.
